item.title: Aspose.Words for Java 2.5.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for Java 2.5.0 We are proud to announce the long-awaited Aspose.Words for Java 2.5.0 release. The list of new features and fixed issues includes 124 items! As you know, our Aspose.Words for Java is a “closely ported” version of our Aspose.Words for .NET. Therefore, Aspose.Words for Java 2.5.0 includes a port of all changes and fixes we’ve made earlier on Aspose.Words for .

item.title: Aspose.Words.Java.2.4.2 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words.Java.2.4.2 Only one fix included by urgent request: Issue ID || Component || Summary || 4925 | Doc | “Unrecognized format of the form field” Exception occurs during opening document. |
